milestones.name: Functional COSP Web Application
deliverables: Integration with identity provider and knowledge base

tasks.description: Allow customers to securely log in using their main SaaS product credentials
Display a personalized onboarding checklist based on the customer's subscription level
Integrate with the existing knowledge base API to allow seamless content searching and viewing

milestones.name: Enhanced COSP with Adoption Metrics and CSM Integration
deliverables: Enhanced COSP with adoption metrics and CSM integration

tasks.description: Display a dashboard showing the customer's adoption metrics (e.g., daily active users, feature usage count)
Provide a 'Contact CSM' button that pre-populates an email or a Zendesk ticket with customer details

key_responsibilities: Manage project scope, timeline, and resources
Monitor and report on project progress
Develop the user interface and user experience
Develop the backend services and APIs
Set up and maintain the development and production environments
Ensure scalability and reliability of the infrastructure
Ensure quality and reliability of the application
Design the user interface and user experience
Conduct user research and usability testing

risk_timeline.description: Delays in third-party API integrations (CRM, Knowledge Base, etc.)
Complexity of the personalized onboarding checklist feature

key_deliverables.deliverable_name: Enhanced COSP with Adoption Metrics and CSM Integration

assumptions: Third-party API integrations will be completed as planned
The development team has the necessary skills and experience to implement the required features
The infrastructure and tooling will be set up and ready for the project start
constraints: Limited budget and resources available for the project
Tight timeline for the MVP release

gantt_chart.latest_gantt_data: {"chart_type":"gantt","project_name":"Customer Onboarding and Success Portal (COSP)","start_date":"2023-04-01","end_date":"2024-01-31","tasks":[{"id":"phase-0","name":"MVP","start":"2023-04-01","end":"2023-09-30","type":"phase","progress":0,"dependencies":[]},{"id":"T1","name":"Implement Single Sign-On (SSO)","start":"2023-04-01","end":"2023-04-14","type":"task","progress":0,"dependencies":["Identity Management System Integration"],"assigned_to":"Front-end Developer","priority":"Critical","parent":"phase-0"},{"id":"T2","name":"Develop Personalized Onboarding Checklists","start":"2023-04-15","end":"2023-05-12","type":"task","progress":0,"dependencies":["Customer Subscription Data Integration","Onboarding Workflow Configuration"],"assigned_to":"Back-end Developer","priority":"Critical","parent":"phase-0"},{"id":"T3","name":"Integrate Knowledge Base","start":"2023-05-13","end":"2023-06-02","type":"task","progress":0,"dependencies":["Knowledge Base API Integration"],"assigned_to":"Back-end Developer","priority":"High","parent":"phase-0"},{"id":"phase-1","name":"Feature Expansion","start":"2023-10-01","end":"2024-01-31","type":"phase","progress":0,"dependencies":[]},{"id":"T4","name":"Implement Adoption Metrics Dashboard","start":"2023-10-01","end":"2023-11-11","type":"task","progress":0,"dependencies":["Product Usage Data Integration","Data Visualization Components"],"assigned_to":"Front-end Developer","priority":"High","parent":"phase-1"},{"id":"T5","name":"Implement Contact CSM Integration","start":"2023-11-12","end":"2023-11-25","type":"task","progress":0,"dependencies":["CRM and Ticketing System Integration"],"assigned_to":"Back-end Developer","priority":"Medium","parent":"phase-1"}],"generated_at":"2025-11-20T17:10:13.886Z"}
